body: The technomancer's class skills (and the key ability for each skill) are Appraise (Int), Craft (Int), Disable Device (Dex), Fly (Dex), Intimidate (Cha), Knowledge (all) (Int), Linguistics (Int), Perception (Wis), Profession (Wis), and Spellcraft (Int).
name: Class Skills
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Technomancer/Prestige Class Technomancer/Class Skills
